properties.description: Object with useful information
properties.name: _misc

properties.description: Object with references to relevant element nodes
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: Whether or not the video should be played on loaded
properties.name: autoPlay

properties.description: Whether or not the video autoPlay option is allowed
properties.name: autoPlayAllowed

properties.description: Video element background color
properties.name: background

properties.description: Whether or not the video should have text tracks
properties.name: captions

properties.description: Whether or not the video controls should be displayed
properties.name: controls

properties.description: Whether or not the video should be played once it has finished
properties.name: deviceFullscreen

properties.description: Window width that is considered the device limit
properties.name: deviceWidth

properties.description: Video gif to be used as the video source fallback
properties.name: fallbackGif

properties.description: Whether or not the video should be played once it has finished
properties.name: loop

properties.description: How the video should be resized to fit its container         Values: contain, cover, fit
properties.name: objectFit

properties.description: Video poster URL
properties.name: poster

properties.description: Video source load strategy         Values: auto, metadata, none         Default: auto
properties.name: preLoad

properties.description: Limit from which video elements should change its appearance
properties.name: responsive

properties.description: Video volume control background color
properties.name: sliderColor

properties.description: Video file URL
properties.name: src

properties.description: Specific device video file URL
properties.name: srcDevice

properties.description: Video time line background color
properties.name: timeLineColor

properties.description: Whether or not the video should be played/paused clicking the video screen
properties.name: touchPlaying

properties.description: Array containing MIME Types for video formats
properties.name: type

properties.description: Video volume value         Values: 0-1
properties.name: volume

methods.description: Set up the auto-play cross-platform support
methods.name: _autoPlaySetUp

methods.description: Set up video controls display monitor
methods.name: _controlsDisplayListener

methods.description: Set up video fullscreen state changed listeners
methods.name: _fullscreenChangeListener

methods.description: Get a minutes formatted label from seconds value
methods.name: _getMinutes

methods.description: Get a seconds formatted label from seconds value
methods.name: _getSeconds

methods.description: Set up the play button click behavior
methods.name: _playBtnListener

methods.description: Set up the HTML video configuration
methods.name: _setUpHTMLVideo

methods.description: Activate or deactivate the fullscreen mode
methods.name: _toggleFullscreen

methods.description: Set up the volume slider behavior
methods.name: _volumeListener
